title: "Indigenous Voice to Parliament needs to ‘unify, not divide’"
excerpt: "Former Deputy Prime Minister John Anderson says it is important an Indigenous Voice to Parliament \"unifies, not divides\". \"That will be a very tricky balance,\" he told Sky News host Chris Kenny. He said he cares \"very deeply\" about the plight of Indigenous Australians and believes the education system in particular is failing them."
